title: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: The Open Type dialog in JDK 1.4 shows obfuscated classes, such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc.
OB: When accessing the Open Type dialog, these obfuscated classes are prominently displayed.
EB: The Open Type dialog should not display obfuscated classes.
SR: Update the Open Type dialog to filter out obfuscated classes and only display non-obfuscated classes.
